Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho has been banned from driving for six months after being caught speeding near the club's training ground in Surrey.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
Mourinho, who led Chelsea to the Premier League championship last month, admitted driving at 60mph in a 50mph zone on the A3 in Esher last September.
The 52-year-old, who already had points on his licence, was also fined Â£750 and ordered to pay Â£160 costs.
He admitted the offence by letter to Surrey Magistrates' Court in Staines.
